languages.text: {n}Marazhai's laughter seems to echo off the deckhead, rumbling throughout the compartment. Looking at the gory mess at his feet, the xenos raises his head and turns slowly, surveying the bridge and the trembling people.{/n} "Behold, {name}! This is what real servants should look like — humiliated, quivering, grovelling! Too afraid to raise their eyes to their {mf|master|mistress}, for {mf|his|her} wrath is more terrible than death! Now not one wretch that serves you will dare to gainsay you or me — for they know their place!"
languages.original_text: {n}Смех Маражая, кажется, отдается от сводов мостика, гремя по всему отсеку. Взглянув на кровавое месиво у своих ног, ксенос вскидывает голову и медленно поворачивается, обводя мостик и трясущихся людей взглядом.{/n} "Смотри, {name}! Вот как должны выглядеть настоящие слуги — униженными, дрожащими, пресмыкающимися! Не смеющими поднять глаз на сво{mf|его|ю} госпо{mf|дина|жу}, ибо гнев {mf|его|ее} страшнее смерти! Теперь ни одна тварь, служащая тебе, более не посмеет перечить ни тебе, ни мне — ибо они знают свое место!"

languages.text: {n}Смех Маражая, кажется, отдается от сводов мостика, гремя по всему отсеку. Взглянув на кровавое месиво у своих ног, ксенос вскидывает голову и медленно поворачивается, обводя мостик и трясущихся людей взглядом.{/n} "Смотри, {name}! Вот как должны выглядеть настоящие слуги — униженными, дрожащими, пресмыкающимися! Не смеющими поднять глаз на сво{mf|его|ю} госпо{mf|дина|жу}, ибо гнев {mf|его|ее} страшнее смерти! Теперь ни одна тварь, служащая тебе, более не посмеет перечить ни тебе, ни мне — ибо они знают свое место!"
{n}玛拉斋的大笑声回荡在舱顶之下，传遍了整个舱室。他瞥了一眼脚下血肉模糊的尸体，缓缓转过目光，打量着眼前的舰桥和瑟瑟发抖的人群。{/n}“看啊，{name}！这才是仆人真正该有的样子——谦卑、战栗、奴颜屈膝！他们甚至不敢抬起头正视他们的主人！君威难测，甚于死亡！现在，再也没有哪个可怜虫胆敢违逆你或我的旨意，他们终于认清了自己的位置！”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's laughter seems to echo off the deckhead, rumbling throughout the compartment. Looking at the gory mess at his feet, the xenos raises his head and turns slowly, surveying the bridge and the trembling people.{/n} "Behold, {name}! This is what real servants should look like — humiliated, quivering, grovelling! Too afraid to raise their eyes to their {mf|master|mistress}, for {mf|his|her} wrath is more terrible than death! Now not one wretch that serves you will dare to gainsay you or me — for they know their place!"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的大笑声回荡在舱顶之下，传遍了整个舱室。他瞥了一眼脚下血肉模糊的尸体，缓缓转过目光，打量着眼前的舰桥和瑟瑟发抖的人群。{/n}“看啊，{name}！这才是仆人真正该有的样子——谦卑、战栗、奴颜屈膝！他们甚至不敢抬起头正视他们的主人！君威难测，甚于死亡！现在，再也没有哪个可怜虫胆敢违逆你或我的旨意，他们终于认清了自己的位置！”

languages.text: {n}La risa de Marazhai parece reverberar en el puente de mando y resuena por el resto del compartimento. Mirando los restos sanguinolentos que yacen a sus pies, el xenos levanta la cabeza y se gira muy despacio, inspeccionando el puente y a sus trémulos ocupantes.{/n} «¡Observa, {name}! ¡Este es el aspecto que deberían tener unos auténticos sirvientes; humillados, temblorosos, postrados! ¡Demasiado asustados para levantar la mirada hacia su {mf|amo|ama}, pues su cólera es más terrible que la muerte! Ahora ni uno solo de los desgraciados que te sirven se atreverá a llevarte la contraria, ni a mí tampoco, ¡porque ya saben cuál es su lugar!».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's laughter seems to echo off the deckhead, rumbling throughout the compartment. Looking at the gory mess at his feet, the xenos raises his head and turns slowly, surveying the bridge and the trembling people.{/n} "Behold, {name}! This is what real servants should look like — humiliated, quivering, grovelling! Too afraid to raise their eyes to their {mf|master|mistress}, for {mf|his|her} wrath is more terrible than death! Now not one wretch that serves you will dare to gainsay you or me — for they know their place!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La risa de Marazhai parece reverberar en el puente de mando y resuena por el resto del compartimento. Mirando los restos sanguinolentos que yacen a sus pies, el xenos levanta la cabeza y se gira muy despacio, inspeccionando el puente y a sus trémulos ocupantes.{/n} «¡Observa, {name}! ¡Este es el aspecto que deberían tener unos auténticos sirvientes; humillados, temblorosos, postrados! ¡Demasiado asustados para levantar la mirada hacia su {mf|amo|ama}, pues su cólera es más terrible que la muerte! Ahora ni uno solo de los desgraciados que te sirven se atreverá a llevarte la contraria, ni a mí tampoco, ¡porque ya saben cuál es su lugar!».

languages.text: {n}Le rire de Marazhai se fait entendre sur le pont et retentit dans tout le compartiment. Après avoir admiré le chaos sanglant à ses pieds, le xénos redresse lentement la tête et toise la foule tremblante.{/n} « Regardez, {name} ! Voilà l'attitude que vous devriez attendre de vos serviteurs : humiliés, tremblants, rampant à vos pieds ! Ils devraient être terrifiés à la simple idée de soutenir le regard de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse}, car ils savent que sa colère est plus effroyable que la mort ! Désormais, plus un seul d'entre eux n'osera nous tenir tête, ni à vous ni à moi : ils ont compris quelle était leur place ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's laughter seems to echo off the deckhead, rumbling throughout the compartment. Looking at the gory mess at his feet, the xenos raises his head and turns slowly, surveying the bridge and the trembling people.{/n} "Behold, {name}! This is what real servants should look like — humiliated, quivering, grovelling! Too afraid to raise their eyes to their {mf|master|mistress}, for {mf|his|her} wrath is more terrible than death! Now not one wretch that serves you will dare to gainsay you or me — for they know their place!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire de Marazhai se fait entendre sur le pont et retentit dans tout le compartiment. Après avoir admiré le chaos sanglant à ses pieds, le xénos redresse lentement la tête et toise la foule tremblante.{/n} « Regardez, {name} ! Voilà l'attitude que vous devriez attendre de vos serviteurs : humiliés, tremblants, rampant à vos pieds ! Ils devraient être terrifiés à la simple idée de soutenir le regard de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse}, car ils savent que sa colère est plus effroyable que la mort ! Désormais, plus un seul d'entre eux n'osera nous tenir tête, ni à vous ni à moi : ils ont compris quelle était leur place ! »

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Gelächter scheint von der Decke des Decks widerzuhallen und dröhnt durchs Abteil. Der Xenos blickt auf Blick auf den Schwall von Blut vor seinen Füßen, hebt den Kopf und dreht sich langsam um. Dann überblickt er die Brücke und die zitternde Crew.{/n} "Schaut hin, {name}! Genau so sollten sich echte Diener verhalten – gedemütigt, zitternd, zu Kreuze kriechend! Zu verängstigt, um {mf|ihren Herr|ihre Herrin} anzublicken, denn {mf|sein|ihr} Zorn ist schrecklicher als der Tod! Jetzt wird es keines dieser erbärmlichen Wesen noch wagen, Euch oder mir zu widersprechen – da sie ihren Platz kennen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's laughter seems to echo off the deckhead, rumbling throughout the compartment. Looking at the gory mess at his feet, the xenos raises his head and turns slowly, surveying the bridge and the trembling people.{/n} "Behold, {name}! This is what real servants should look like — humiliated, quivering, grovelling! Too afraid to raise their eyes to their {mf|master|mistress}, for {mf|his|her} wrath is more terrible than death! Now not one wretch that serves you will dare to gainsay you or me — for they know their place!"

Der Xenos blickt auf Blick auf den Schwall von Blut vor seinen Füßen, hebt den Kopf und dreht sich langsam um. Dann überblickt er die Brücke und die zitternde Crew.{/n} "Schaut hin, {name}! Jetzt wird es keines dieser erbärmlichen Wesen noch wagen, Euch oder mir zu widersprechen – da sie ihren Platz kennen!"

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの笑い声がデッキヘッドに反響し、コンパートメント中に鳴り響く。足元の惨状を見て、異種族は頭を上げ、ゆっくりと振り返り、ブリッジと震える人々を見渡した。{/n}「見ろ、{name}！これこそがしもべの真にあるべき姿 ― 屈辱に打ち震え、ひれ伏す姿が！恐れおののいて、主に目を向けることもできない！その怒りが、死よりも恐ろしいからだ！今や、お前に仕える哀れな者たちは、誰一人として、お前や俺に逆らおうとはしないだろう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's laughter seems to echo off the deckhead, rumbling throughout the compartment. Looking at the gory mess at his feet, the xenos raises his head and turns slowly, surveying the bridge and the trembling people.{/n} "Behold, {name}! This is what real servants should look like — humiliated, quivering, grovelling! Too afraid to raise their eyes to their {mf|master|mistress}, for {mf|his|her} wrath is more terrible than death! Now not one wretch that serves you will dare to gainsay you or me — for they know their place!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの笑い声がデッキヘッドに反響し、コンパートメント中に鳴り響く。足元の惨状を見て、異種族は頭を上げ、ゆっくりと振り返り、ブリッジと震える人々を見渡した。{/n}「見ろ、{name}！これこそがしもべの真にあるべき姿 ― 屈辱に打ち震え、ひれ伏す姿が！恐れおののいて、主に目を向けることもできない！その怒りが、死よりも恐ろしいからだ！今や、お前に仕える哀れな者たちは、誰一人として、お前や俺に逆らおうとはしないだろう！」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın kahkahası, güvertenin altında bile yankılanarak tüm kompartımanda gümbürdemiş gibi geliyor. Ayaklarının dibindeki kana bulanmış keşmekeşe bakan zeno, kafasını kaldırıp yavaşça dönerek köprüyü ve titreyen insanları inceliyor.{/n} "İşte {name}! Gerçek hizmetkârlar böyle görünmeli. Küçük düşmüş, titreyip duran, gururdan yoksun... Efendilerinin gazabı, ölümden bile beter diye gözlerini kaldırıp ona bakamayacak kadar korkuyorlar! Bundan sonra hizmetindeki tek bir zavallı bile sana ya da bana karşı çıkmaya cüret edemeyecek. Çünkü artık hadlerini biliyorlar!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's laughter seems to echo off the deckhead, rumbling throughout the compartment. Looking at the gory mess at his feet, the xenos raises his head and turns slowly, surveying the bridge and the trembling people.{/n} "Behold, {name}! This is what real servants should look like — humiliated, quivering, grovelling! Too afraid to raise their eyes to their {mf|master|mistress}, for {mf|his|her} wrath is more terrible than death! Now not one wretch that serves you will dare to gainsay you or me — for they know their place!"
